history.proof: unfold Z_Zp. exists 0. qsimpl use: div_by_p_lt.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 Unable to unify "S (div ?M1447 ?M1446) <= ?M1447" with "1 <= p".

original: unfold Z_Zp. exists 0. apply div_by_p_lt. - apply prime_ge_2. split. apply Hp. intros q Hdiv. destruct Hdiv as [x Hx]. destruct Hp. rewrite Hx. destruct x. + right. reflexivity. + left. apply div_eq_0. all: auto. - apply div_ge_1. auto. apply Lt.le_lt_n_Sm. apply Lt.lt_O_Sn.
